## ABOUT ME


### Personal Profile

Hello, my name is [Zhuohan Sun][1], but you can also call me Linda.  
I come from Shenyang, China.  I am a student from the STA9750 class in the Fall 2025 semester.  I’m a graduate student in the Marketing Analytics program at [Baruch College][2].  I earned my bachelor’s degree in Business Administration with a minor in Marketing from Iona College.

In my free time, I love traveling and cooking. I also have a lovely silver-shaded cat named Martini.
